main event: A witness observed a bright orange-yellow object in the sky, resembling the North Star, for 35 seconds.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at 2-4,000 mph,The observation lasted for 35 seconds,The object made a straight flight path towards the west,The witness described the object as disappearing instantly without fading,There was no physical evidence recovered.
sighted object: one bright orange-yellow object in the sky
witness description: Civilian who observed the object outdoors
